page.title: 06Industry/Trade In Steyning
page.content: Steyning has it's own{Printing Works on the premises of{Wests the {Newsagents}.Steyning also houses a {Record Stylus Company}called{S.M.E.. It is run by someone who contributed to Steyning's parks by buying up a field and converting it into a public park. { Chalcroft Bros.}are a building firm but they are also{Funeral Directors. {------------------------------------- There are a great variety of shops in Steyning,from{Butchers to Banks.}The trade in shops is good all the year round.People have carried their family trade and kept it going for several generations . The trade is normally better for{Clothes and Butcher}shops in the winter and it is usually better in the summer for{Sweet}shops because they sell ice_creams and drinks.
